body.p: The MPC8306 processor uses DDR2 SDRAM as the system memory. The DDR2 interface uses the SSTL2 driver/receiver and 1.8 V power. A Vref 1.8V/2 is needed for all SSTL2 receivers in the DDR2 interface. Since DDR2 SDRAM chip operates at 1.8 V and uses SSTL2 interface, it will directly interface with the MPC8306 without any level translation. The 1.8 V interface supply is provided by an on-board voltage regulator. VREF, which is half the interface voltage (0.9 V), is provided by a voltage divider of the 1.8 V for voltage tracking.
